acceptance-test-run.title: C04-F00-S01-05 internal oldap user with valid credential can access idm service
acceptance-test-run.name: C04-F00-S01-05 internal oldap user with valid credential can access idm service

user-story.name: C04 f00 s01 authentication internal user

tag.name: C04 f00 authentication/C04 f00 s01 authentication internal user

test-step.description: Given post request to login with: falcon, {123456}
And get request "/idm-service/api/scim/organizations/ITSMA/configurations/ITSMAIdmLdapConfiguration1" with falcon's token
Then entryset in entry {root} should be: ［|displayName|baseDn |userId |configurationType |name | |ITSMALDAP |dc=itsma,dc=com|cn=admin,dc=itsma,dc=com|LDAP_CONFIGURATION|ITSMAIdmLdapConfiguration1|］
